meanings.definition: Already hardened before use or further processing.
meanings.sent1: The prehardened steel was ready for immediate use in construction projects.
meanings.sent2: The prehardened metal parts saved time during the manufacturing process.
meanings.sent3: The prehardened material was so tough, even the strongest hammer couldn't dent it!
meanings.sent4: Her resolve was like prehardened steel, unyielding in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The prehardened glass shattered expectations with its durability.
